org.lenskit.data.dao.file

Class TextEntitySource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.data.dao.file.TextEntitySource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntitySource

    public class TextEntitySource
extends Object
implements EntitySource

    Entity reader that loads entities from text data, often stored in a file.
